snippet: The United States will host Iran and Russia in an exhibition in Grand Central Terminal in New York on May 15.
lead_paragraph: The United States will host Iran and Russia in an exhibition in Grand Central Terminal in New York on May 15.

headline.seo: Iran and Russia Invited to United States for Wrestling Exhibition
headline.main: Iran and Russia Invited to the U.S. for Wrestling Exhibition
headline.print_headline: Iran and Russia Invited to the U.S.
